_comment: Test file for the Breast Cancer Prediction API
_description: This file contains a valid JSON payload example for performing predictions through the POST /predict endpoint of the API. It includes the 30 numerical features required by the breast cancer classification model based on the Breast Cancer Wisconsin Diagnostic dataset.

_structure.features: List of 30 numerical values (float) representing features extracted from cell nucleus images

groups.indices_0_9: Mean values of 10 characteristics (radius, texture, perimeter, area, smoothness, compactness, concavity, concave points, symmetry, fractal dimension)
groups.indices_10_19: Standard errors of the same 10 characteristics
groups.indices_20_29: Worst values (maximum) of the same 10 characteristics

_feature_details.feature_0: Mean radius of the cell nucleus
_feature_details.feature_1: Mean texture (standard deviation of grayscale values)
_feature_details.feature_4: Mean smoothness (local variation in radius lengths)
_feature_details.feature_6: Mean concavity (severity of concave portions of the contour)
_feature_details.feature_7: Mean concave points (number of concave contour portions)
